Deck.java

Constructor Summary
Deck()
          Constructs the deck class Creates a deck with cards in the deck in the correct order
 
Method Summary
 Card drawCard()
          This method will create a new array list The card at the top of the deck will be added to the new array list, and then that card will be removed from the deck
 void fillDeck()
          This method fills the deck
 java.util.ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
          This method will return the deck
 void resetShuffle()
          This method will reset the deck and shuffle the cards when the amount of cards in a deck is less than 20.
 void shuffle()
          This method will shuffle the deck of cards
 java.lang.String toString()
          This method creates a toString that will print out the deck
